Form-validation

Form validation ensures that user input in forms is validated at the moment the form is being filled in. This on-change form validation is provided by default. It means that all fields are validated at the moment the content changes. This validation is also triggered when tabbing through fields.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-form-validation

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-form-validation

Usage

Import JS

                  
                  import { Formvalidation } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-form-validation';

Info and options

The [data-validate-form] attribute is required on the form element. If the form does not require any validation, then set the [novalidate] attribute. This will prevent the default HTML5-validation of the browser from being triggered.

Required validation

Use the [data-required="true"] attribute to make a field required. This will ensure that an empty field submission returns an error.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-1">Naam</label><div class="vl-input-group">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      name="validation-1" id="validation-1"
      type="text"
      data-required="true"
      data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
      data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
      data-vl-error-message="Veld &quot;Naam&quot; is verplicht"
      data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-1-error"aria-required="true"
      aria-invalid="true"></div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-1-error"></div>

Email validation

Set the [data-vl-validation-type="email"] attribute to check if an email address is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-2">E-mailadres</label><div class="vl-input-group">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      name="validation-2" id="validation-2"
      type="email"
      data-required="true"
      data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
      data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
      data-vl-error-message="Een geldig e-mailadres is verplicht"
      data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-2-error"data-vl-validation-type="email"placeholder="email@provider.com"aria-required="true"
      aria-invalid="true"></div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-2-error"></div>

IBAN validation

Set the [data-vl-validation-type="iban"] attribute to check if an IBAN number is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-3">IBAN-nummer</label><div class="vl-input-group">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      name="validation-3" id="validation-3"
      type="text"
      data-required="true"
      data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
      data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
      data-vl-error-message="Een geldig IBAN-nummer is verplicht"
      data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-3-error"data-vl-validation-type="iban"placeholder="BE00 0000 0000 0000"aria-required="true"
      aria-invalid="true"></div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-3-error"></div>

Phone number validation

Set the [data-vl-validation-type="phone"] attribute to check if a phone number is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-4">Telefoonnummer</label><div class="vl-input-group">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      name="validation-4" id="validation-4"
      type="phone"
      data-required="true"
      data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
      data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
      data-vl-error-message="Een geldig telefoonnummer is verplicht"
      data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-4-error"data-vl-validation-type="phone"placeholder="+32 O 000 00 00"aria-required="true"
      aria-invalid="true"></div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-4-error"></div>

Date validation

Set the [data-vl-validation-type="date"] attribute to check if a date is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-5">Datum (dd.mm.jjjj)</label><div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker js-vl-datepicker">
    <input class="vl-input-fieldjs-vl-datepicker-input"
      name="validation-5" id="validation-5"
      type="text"
      data-required="true"
      data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
      data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
      data-vl-error-message="Een geldige datum is verplicht"
      data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-5-error"data-vl-validation-type="date"
        data-vl-datepicker-min="01.01.2016"
        data-vl-datepicker-max="01.01.2020"
      placeholder="01.01.2018"aria-required="true"
      aria-invalid="true">
        <button type="button" name="button"
          class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum in kalender">
          <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
          <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">
            Kies datum in kalender
          </span>
        </button>
      </div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-5-error"></div>

RRN validation

Set the [data-vl-validation-type="rrn"] attribute to check if a Resident Registration Number (RRN) is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-6">Rijksregisternummer</label><div class="vl-input-group">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      name="validation-6" id="validation-6"
      type="text"
      data-required="true"
      data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
      data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
      data-vl-error-message="Een geldig rijksregisternummer is verplicht"
      data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-6-error"data-vl-validation-type="rrn"placeholder="11.22.33-444.55"aria-required="true"
      aria-invalid="true"></div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-6-error"></div>

Select validation

Add select validation to ensure that the user selects a value from the list and the value is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-7">
    Stad
  </label><div class="vl-form-group">
      <div data-vl-validate-error-parent>
      <select class="vl-select"
        name="validation-7" id="validation-7"
        data-required="true"
        data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
        data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
        data-vl-error-message="Kies een stad"
        data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-7-error"data-vl-validation-type="select"aria-required="true"
        aria-invalid="true">
          <option placeholder value="" placeholder>-- Kies een stad --</option><option value="Aalst">Aalst</option><option value="Antwerpen">Antwerpen</option><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Hasselt">Hasselt</option></select>
    </div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-7-error"></div></div>

Select JS validation

Add select JS validation to ensure that the user selects a value from the list and the value is valid.

      
  <label class="vl-form__label" for="validation-8">
    Stad
  </label><div class="vl-form-group">
      <div data-vl-validate-error-parent>
      <select class="vl-select"
        name="validation-8" id="validation-8"data-vl-select
        data-required="true"
        data-vl-success-class="vl-input-field--success"
        data-vl-error-class="vl-input-field--error"
        data-vl-error-message="Kies een stad"
        data-vl-error-placeholder="validation-8-error"data-vl-validation-type="select"aria-required="true"
        aria-invalid="true">
          <option placeholder value="" placeholder>-- Kies een stad --</option><option value="Aalst">Aalst</option><option value="Antwerpen">Antwerpen</option><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Hasselt">Hasselt</option></select>
    </div><div class="vl-form__error" data-vl-error-id="validation-8-error"></div></div>
